comment_text: I agree! I could just wrap myself in a cocoon of inquirer sessions where I just respond to endless question in the command line.
Does anyone know where I can get any Inquirer branded apparel??
I once had a job where they just wanted me to develop new AI code and I said - wait? What? WHere's the Inquirer stuff??? I gave my notice that day.
I love bash and really miss the DOS prompt. Damn you Windows.
GUI shmoo-eeee. That's all I have to say.
